explains: n. 着陆，降落；触地；触地得分

sentences.en: Patten scored his second touchdown of the game.
sentences.cn: 帕顿在比赛中第2次持球触地得分。

sentences.en: The astronauts are preparing for touchdown tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 宇航员正准备明晨的降落。

sentences.en: He caught a punt and scored the winning touchdown, with a minute left to play.
sentences.cn: 他将开出的悬空球接住，在比赛还剩一分钟时成功达阵得分。
